member.name: T:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController
member.summary: CRUD Operations on category table in database.

member.summary: Get all categories only

member.name: M:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController.GetAllTree
member.summary: Get all categories and subcategories and interior categories in tree structure
member.returns: List of categories and subcategories and interior categories in tree structure

member.name: M:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController.GetDataById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a category by its ID

member.name: M:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController.GetForDropDown
member.summary: Get the list of all categories available and ready for dropdown in the front end
member.returns: Return Code and Description of the categories

member.name: M:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController.Create(BB20_Categories.Models.DTOs.CategoryDTO)
member.summary: This endpoint is for the creation of a category, you can create one category at a time.
member.returns: One recored with the category created and its Id.

member.name: M:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController.Update(BB20_Categories.Models.DTOs.CategoryDTO)
member.summary: This endpoint is for the update of a category, you can update one category at a time.
member.returns: Do not return category only http code 204

member.name: M:BB20_Categories.Controllers.v1.CategoryController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: This endpoint is for the logically delete a category, you can delete one category at a time.
member.param: Id of the category to delete, this value is uuid
